assessments.status_rationale: No BEA release or reporting of the November 2025 Core PCE print in today's news; deadline is later in December.
Headlines mention Black Friday spending, but there is no official Census Bureau Advance Retail Sales print for November 2025 yet.
No report of India’s November 2025 CPI in the news bullets; release typically mid-December.
No EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report cited showing an 8+ million barrel crude draw.
No mention of ICE Arabica Coffee futures reaching or exceeding 230.00 cents/lb.
No evidence provided of the U.S. 2s10s spread closing at or above 0.00% on any day.
Window for KEV additions begins Dec 16; no relevant CISA updates in today’s news.
No EU press release or Official Journal entry on new Iran-related sanctions is noted.
No report of VIX closing at or below 11.50.
Final Euro area Manufacturing PMI for November 2025 is not reported in the bullets; release expected by Dec 2.
No Cisco PSIRT advisory with CVSS ≥ 9.0 reported; December window not yet covered by today’s news.
Despite mention of solar-flare-linked issues, there is no NOAA SWPC G2 Watch/Warning issuance cited.
